items.content_html:
If you find this project helpful and you like it, consider supporting its development by making a donation. Your support is greatly appreciated! üôè

As always, if you encounter any bugs or have suggestions for features head over to the Discord. We all like to share and help and everyone is welcome here.

What's Changed

  • Added a workaround for the shadow title bar that is present when the window is not focused. This issue happened due to a bug in electron. electron/electron#39959
  • Removed the standalone Click-through option. Since vanish does the same there's no need to have it available and it can lead to confusion
  • Fix typo by @wont-stream in #761

New Contributors

  • @wont-stream made their first contribution in #761

Full Changelog: v2.2.5...v2.2.6

As always, if you encounter any bugs or have suggestions for features head over to the Discord. We all like to share and help and everyone is welcome here.

What's Changed

  • Fixed a crash on initial startup after installation in case no config is present (completely fresh installation)
  • Add a crash report sending dialog in case a fatal error happens (report is sent to discord in a private channel)
  • Updated deps
  • chore(deps): update typescript-eslint monorepo to v5.60.0 by @renovate in #587
  • chore(deps): update dependency electron to v25.2.0 by @renovate in #586
  • chore(deps): update dependency vue-tsc to v1.8.1 by @renovate in #585
  • chore(deps): update dependency sass to v1.63.6 by @renovate in #584
  • chore(deps): update dependency eslint-plugin-vue to v9.15.1 by @renovate in #588

Solution to "GhostChat Cannot Be Opened Because the Developer Cannot be Verified" Error on Mac

  • Open Finder.
  • Locate GhostChat.
  • Control+Click the app.
  • Select Open.
  • Click Open.
  • The app should be saved as an exception in your security settings, allowing you to open it in the future.

Full Changelog: v2.2.4...v2.2.5

What's changed

  • refactored the external input source validation

Full Changelog: v2.2.3...v2.2.4

What's Changed

  • Minor improvements to the view rendering. Chat and settings should now properly use the given view space.
  • Updated dependencies
  • Update Korean localization by @PlavorSeol in #571
